Would it make you more comfortable if you suspected people were lying on the application forms and putting "sporting use" as reason for ownership when they were really buying a gun so that the next person that chose to victimize them would be found dead by the police?
Ethmi

According to my dictionary kill means "cause death of". So the thing that causes the death does not necessarily have be intelligent or do it intentionally. So I believe your argument is a diversionary tactic, an attempt to avoid dealing with the real issue. 
 
 There are situations in which if a gun had not been present no one would have died. So I think it\'s perfectly accurate to say that guns do kill.

 
 This entire argument is just an attempt to win. It doesn\'t matter what kill means, nor does it matter that guns can kill. The "real issue" that has been twisted by you is that a gun won\'t leap off the table and shoot somebody on its own. It needs somebody at the trigger. So tell me, do you want to arrest the gun or the shooter?
